drawings.name: Horizontal Line
drawings.description: A fixed horizontal line at a specified price level, useful for marking support and resistance levels

inputs.name: price
inputs.description: The y-axis price level where the line is positioned

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: Optional label text for the horizontal line

overrides.name: lineColor
overrides.description: Line color in RGB or RGBA format

overrides.name: textColor
overrides.description: Text color in RGB or RGBA format

overrides.name: showPrice
overrides.description: Show price label for horizontal line

drawings.notes: Multiple horizontal lines can be added to a single chart. The line extends across the entire visible chart width.

drawings.name: Trend Line
drawings.description: A diagonal line connecting two price points to identify support/resistance trends and price action

inputs.name: startDatetime
inputs.description: Starting point datetime in ISO8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.sssZ)

inputs.name: startPrice
inputs.description: Starting point price level

inputs.name: endDatetime
inputs.description: Ending point datetime in ISO8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.sssZ)

inputs.name: endPrice
inputs.description: Ending point price level

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: Optional label text for the trendline

overrides.name: lineColor
overrides.description: Line color in RGB or RGBA format

overrides.name: textColor
overrides.description: Text color in RGB or RGBA format

overrides.name: showLabel
overrides.description: Show text label for trend line

drawings.notes: Requires two price points with corresponding ISO8601 datetimes. Useful for identifying trend direction and momentum. IMPORTANT: Must use actual price levels and dates from the chart for drawing to render correctly.

drawings.name: Vertical Line
drawings.description: A vertical line at a specific time point on the chart, useful for marking events or important time periods

inputs.name: datetime
inputs.description: Datetime for the vertical line in ISO8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.sssZ)

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: Optional label text for the vertical line

overrides.name: lineColor
overrides.description: Line color in RGB or RGBA format

overrides.name: textColor
overrides.description: Text color in RGB or RGBA format

drawings.notes: Marks a specific point in time on the chart. Useful for highlighting important events or analysis points. IMPORTANT: Must use actual dates visible on the chart for drawing to render correctly.

drawings.name: Order Line
drawings.description: Marks specific price levels for trade entry/exit points, commonly used to display pending or executed orders

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: Order line label text (e.g., 'BUY ORDER #1')

inputs.name: quantity
inputs.description: Order quantity (e.g., '0.25 BTC')

inputs.name: price
inputs.description: Order price level (optional, uses {LAST_PRICE} as default)

overrides.name: lineColor
overrides.description: Line color in RGB or RGBA format

drawings.notes: Specifically designed for marking trade orders with quantity and price. Shows detailed order information with customizable colors.

drawings.name: Long Position
drawings.description: Visualizes a complete long trading position with entry, target, and stop-loss levels, including profit/loss areas

inputs.name: startDatetime
inputs.description: Position area start datetime in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: entryPrice
inputs.description: Long entry price

inputs.name: targetPrice
inputs.description: Long take-profit target price

inputs.name: stopPrice
inputs.description: Long stop-loss price

inputs.name: endDatetime
inputs.description: Position area end datetime in ISO8601 format (optional)

overrides.name: profitBackground
overrides.description: Profit area background color (green for long)

drawings.notes: Creates colored areas between price levels. Green area shows potential profit (entry to target), red area shows potential loss (entry to stop).

drawings.name: Short Position
drawings.description: Visualizes a complete short trading position with entry, target, and stop-loss levels, including profit/loss areas

inputs.name: startDatetime
inputs.description: Position area start datetime in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: entryPrice
inputs.description: Short entry price

inputs.name: targetPrice
inputs.description: Short take-profit target price

inputs.name: stopPrice
inputs.description: Short stop-loss price

inputs.name: endDatetime
inputs.description: Position area end datetime in ISO8601 format (optional)

overrides.name: profitBackground
overrides.description: Profit area background color (teal for short)

drawings.notes: Creates colored areas between price levels. Teal area shows potential profit (entry to target), red area shows potential loss (entry to stop).

drawings.name: Fib Retracement
drawings.description: Fibonacci Retracement tool for identifying potential support and resistance levels based on Fibonacci ratios

inputs.name: startDatetime
inputs.description: Start position x-axis in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: startPrice
inputs.description: Start position y-axis (price level)

inputs.name: endDatetime
inputs.description: End position x-axis in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: endPrice
inputs.description: End position y-axis (price level)

overrides.name: showCoeff
overrides.description: Show coefficient values in the label

overrides.name: fibLevelBasedOnLogScale
overrides.description: Override showInvertScale must be set to true

drawings.notes: Fibonacci Retracement draws horizontal lines at key Fibonacci levels between two price points. Traders use these levels to identify potential support and resistance areas.

drawings.name: Date Range
drawings.description: Highlights a specific time and price range on the chart with a rectangular area

inputs.name: startDatetime
inputs.description: Range start position x-axis in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: startPrice
inputs.description: Range start position y-axis (price level)

inputs.name: endDatetime
inputs.description: Range end position x-axis in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: endPrice
inputs.description: Range end position y-axis (price level)

overrides.name: fillBackground
overrides.description: Fill the range area with background color

overrides.name: extendTop
overrides.description: Extend the range to the top of the chart

overrides.name: extendBottom
overrides.description: Extend the range to the bottom of the chart

drawings.notes: Creates a rectangular highlight area between two datetime/price points. Useful for marking important time periods or price zones.

drawings.name: Date Price Range
drawings.description: Highlights a specific time and price range on the chart with percentage and price change information

inputs.name: startDatetime
inputs.description: Range start position x-axis in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: startPrice
inputs.description: Range start position y-axis (price level)

inputs.name: endDatetime
inputs.description: Range end position x-axis in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: endPrice
inputs.description: Range end position y-axis (price level)

overrides.name: fillBackground
overrides.description: Fill the range area with background color

drawings.notes: Creates a rectangular highlight area showing price and percentage change between two datetime/price points. Similar to Date Range but focuses on price movement statistics.

drawings.name: Rectangle
drawings.description: Draws a customizable rectangle with optional text label to highlight specific chart areas

inputs.name: startDatetime
inputs.description: Left x-axis start position in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: startPrice
inputs.description: Left y-axis start position (price level)

inputs.name: endDatetime
inputs.description: Right x-axis end position in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: endPrice
inputs.description: Right y-axis end position (price level)

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: Label text (optional)

overrides.name: horzLabelAlign
overrides.description: Text label horizontal align (center, left, right)

overrides.name: vertLabelAlign
overrides.description: Text label vertical align (top, middle, bottom)

overrides.name: backgroundColor
overrides.description: Background fill color in RGBA format

drawings.notes: Creates a rectangular shape with customizable borders, fill, and optional text label. Useful for marking important zones or areas on the chart.

drawings.name: Arrow Marker
drawings.description: Draws an arrow from one point to another with optional text label to indicate direction or important movements

inputs.name: startDatetime
inputs.description: Tail of the arrow x-axis in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: startPrice
inputs.description: Tail of the arrow y-axis (price level)

inputs.name: endDatetime
inputs.description: Head of the arrow x-axis in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: endPrice
inputs.description: Head of the arrow y-axis (price level)

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: Label text (optional)

drawings.notes: Creates an arrow pointing from start to end position with optional text label. Useful for annotating important price movements or trends.

drawings.name: Arrow Mark Up
drawings.description: Draws an upward-pointing arrow at a specific price and time with optional text label

inputs.name: datetime
inputs.description: Arrow head x-axis position in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: price
inputs.description: Arrow head y-axis position (price level)

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: Label text (optional)

drawings.notes: Creates an upward-pointing arrow at a specific location with optional text. Commonly used to mark buy signals or bullish points.

drawings.name: Arrow Mark Down
drawings.description: Draws a downward-pointing arrow at a specific price and time with optional text label

inputs.name: datetime
inputs.description: Arrow head x-axis position in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: price
inputs.description: Arrow head y-axis position (price level)

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: Label text (optional)

drawings.notes: Creates a downward-pointing arrow at a specific location with optional text. Commonly used to mark sell signals or bearish points.

drawings.name: Text
drawings.description: Adds customizable text annotation at a specific price and time location on the chart

inputs.name: datetime
inputs.description: Text x-axis start position in ISO8601 format

inputs.name: price
inputs.description: Text y-axis start position (price level)

inputs.name: text
inputs.description: Text content to display

overrides.name: fillBackground
overrides.description: Show text with filled background color

overrides.name: backgroundColor
overrides.description: Background fill color in RGBA format

drawings.notes: Adds free-form text at any location on the chart. Can be styled with bold, italic, borders, and background fills.

batches.range: Trend Line, Vertical Line (FULLY WORKING - tested on Gold chart)
Long Position, Short Position (Trading position visualization)
